//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "computer_guy", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "signal" )
	{
		set ( "SET_HAND_SIGNAL", "Halt" );
	}


	task ( "getaway1" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "8 -" );
		set ( "SET_STANCE", "Crouch" );
		set ( "SET_MOOD", "Stealth" );
	}

	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_HEALTH", "500" );
	dowait ( "signal" );
	wait ( 500.000 );
	dowait ( "getaway1" );
}
